The Dongjiahe Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in Dongjiahe Village, Chengguan Town, Chengcheng County, Weinan City, Shaanxi Province

operators: Shaanxi Shaanmei Chenghe Mining Company Dongjiahe Coal Mine Branch
owners: Shaanxi Coal and Chemical Industry Group
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by a branch of Shaanxi Shaanmei Chenghe Mining Company, which is part of the larger Shaanxi Coal and Chemical Industry Group.
